titlestmt.titleproper: Steven H. Scheuer Publicity Stills Collection
titlestmt.subtitle:
An inventory of
the collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: [unknown]

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Steven H. Scheuer Publicity Stills Collection

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p:
Steven H. Scheuer is a movie and television historian and critic. He was the editor of
Movies on TV (originally titled
TV Movie Almanac & Ratings) which went through 17 editions between 1958 and 1993. The first guide of its kind (it preceded the still-active Maltin's
TV Movies and Video Guide by ten years), the book contained a mixture of movies, videos and TV movies with ratings up to four stars.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p:
The
Steven H. Scheuer Publicity Stills Collection consists entirely of still photographs from television shows from the 1950s through the 1990s.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: Alphabetical by name of person or show.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has substantial holdings related to television and broadcasting history. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing.

controlaccess.head: Subject and Genre Headings
controlaccess.subject: Radio, television, film
Popular culture
Television -- United States.
Television actors and actresses -- United States.
Television programs.
Popular culture -- United States.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Steven H. Scheuer Publicity Stills Collection,
&su_name;
